ValidationRule.description: RBM's can change owner. It does not affect ownership transfer if the owner and user are the same.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($UserRole.Name = "RBM",ischanged( OwnerId ), $User.Id <> PRIORVALUE( OwnerId ), TEXT ($User.RBM_Territory__c)<> TEXT( Territory__c ), RMB__c <> "RBM" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: RBM Can only change Ownership for Accounts in their Territory and in SPG or End User
